attributes.action: Review The Tender Given to South Eastern Trains As Their Service is Utter Joke!
attributes.additional_details: I propose either a alteration to the already astronomical fares we pay for the service or that the Government revoke their tender and install someone that can actually run a service they advertise!
attributes.background: South Eastern Trains run the most appalling train service in the country! Trains are constantly Delayed, Diverted or in some cases, don't even turn up!!! The Greenwich line is by far the worst, and something must be done as we all pay thousands of pounds a year for the disgusting service we receive
